name: sshaitan/phppdf
description: Pdf and graphic files generator library for PHP. Fixed for PHP7. RU auto-hyphens support

suggest.zendframework/zend-barcode: If you want to use barcodes
suggest.zendframework/zend-validator: If you want to use barcodes (required by zend-barcode)
suggest.imagine/imagine: If you want to use image generating (required version: >=v0.2.6)
